column3: Sport;Kampong Speu: As reported in ------January ------Cambodia will have a 500 hectare race track in Kampong Speu province on land belonging to Oknha Mong Reththy.------Photos from Vanna Sokheng show the rack has been laid and amenities being built at the Yamamoto Race Circuit in Saen Dei commune in Kampong Speuâ€™s Samrong Tong district.------There is no official word as yet on the opening date
column4: but is likely to be before the end of this year.------Photo credits: Vanna Sokheng Official Page (Check out 360 ------image here------)
